Assertion condition defined as a Lambda expression in pl.allegro.tech.hermes.test.helper.client.integration.HermesTestClient 
expected: ACTIVE
 but was: PENDING within 10 seconds.
Range for response status value 404 NOT_FOUND expected:<SUCCESSFUL> but was:<CLIENT_ERROR>
Expecting value to be true but was false
Status expected:<400 BAD_REQUEST> but was:<404 NOT_FOUND>

Expecting actual:
  "HTTP/1.1 404 Not FoundHermes-Message-Id: 54ee591d-92d9-4d00-9581-5602024142ffTransfer-Encoding: chunkedContent-Type: application/jsonDate: Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:43:44 GMT"
to contain:
  "408 Request Time-out"

Expecting actual:
  "HTTP/1.1 404 Not FoundHermes-Message-Id: 5546d7c1-0e34-4424-9120-5ac30a09e3beTransfer-Encoding: chunkedContent-Type: application/jsonDate: Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:43:44 GMT"
to contain:
  "408 Request Time-out"
Response body does not contain [DatacenterReadiness{datacenter='dc', status=READY}]
